text:
This Dr done one cystoscopy in his room and my prostate got severely infected
and till date it is not fully cured.
This cystoscope should have been done in an operation theatre set up not in his room.
it is a serious offence.
a doctor is doing harm to patient

Great doctor but waiting time is either over 1 or 2 hours and that is just unacceptable in this day and age. No matter how good the doctor is, he or she needs to respect the patient’s time as well. On top of that, how can there receptionists be so unprofessional? Being super nosy and asking all these personal questions that doesn’t concern them at all.
Great doctor, but a few of his receptionists and nurses behave like dogs and won't accept any mistakes on their part.

One of the best doctor in town … ! A lot of patient flooded in to see him as country is open up . The nurses have been patiently serve all the patients ! Really a lot of patient they need to serve . Spare a thought for them ! White angels is not easy !

I think Dr Tan needs to change his staffs. They are all very rude. No empathy at all to the patients. The clinic are so crowded. You still have to wait for 2 hrs even though you have made an appt and come on time.
